Articles.Content:
(Steam version. KSP 1.0.2)

Small landing gear brakes accelerate when tied in an action group with LV-T30 (not tested with other engines).

The engine has a 0 trust limiter set and not working.

When I press the brake key it accelerates even tough I am on 0% trust with the main trust control. 

Does not work while in the air(flying) only works when touching the ground.

It accelerates at about 5 to 15 m/s.

Bug is reproducible.

Edit: Looks like it happens when I travel with more than 37 or so m/s on the surface.

Picture of craft:

Edit: Brake torque 30.

Edit: Confirmed its only on certain places of land it may have nothing to do with the action groups(because it accelerates only on certain places and brakes on others it has to be moving on the ground tough).

(Reason for "Aerodynamic Forces Overlay Enabled" F12 is my screenshot key)
